title: Prepare Form 941, Employer's Quarterly Federal Tax Return
description: A small business with 3 employees needs to file its quarterly payroll tax return, Form 941.

tasks.description: Import the quarterly payroll data, including total wages paid and federal income tax withheld.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully imports all relevant payroll figures for the quarter.

tasks.description: Calculate the employer and employee portions of Social Security and Medicare taxes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the FICA taxes.

tasks.description: Complete Form 941 and reconcile the total taxes with the total payroll tax deposits made during the quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares an accurate Form 941 that reconciles with deposits.
